document_data.name: Doabro Thoaloat
document_data.mainbody:
'''Doabro Thoaloat''' was a mage at some point prior to the 8{{th}} century [[DR]].
{{quote|Doabro Thoaloat was a wily old goat...|The Srinshee, rhyming}}
document_data.Legacy: [[Thoaloat's Variant]] was an alteration of some spell the [[Srinshee]], an [[elven]] [[baelnorn]], taught [[Elminster Aumar]], a [[Chosen of Mystra]]; the spell could duplicate and reshape a tree at the same time. She taught it using a rhyme about Doabro Thoaloat.
